Product Title: buyifan 430pcs Kids Temporary Tattoo for Forest Animals, Insects, Sea Animals,Circus theme Tattoos Sticker,for little Boys and Girls Waterproof Long Lasting and Non-toxic

Product Details: {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'BUYIFAN', 'Style': 'Tattoos Sticker', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Pattern': 'Tribal', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.83 x 0.47 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '768494201005'}
Review Text: Purchased these for my treasure box at work. There is something for everyone in this package of tattoos. I tired them on myself and they lasted 3 days with showering and scrubbing daily.  My students get a kick out of these and often show up to school wearing them. I have seen them last 3-5 days on my students. Cute images, bright colors and worth the price.

reference_summary:
Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
RATED GREEN
{'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Used my regular shampoo, then followed up with this hair mask. Left it on for 5 mins and brushed it through my hair with a comb in the shower. The smell is amazing( if you like bananas, which I do ) After washing I let my hair air dry and my hair is so smooth and soft. I also have a nice shine to my hair. I notice with this product a little goes a long way so one bottle can last a while. Never used a hair mask before and I really like the life it gave my hair back.  I will continue to use this 1-2 times a week.
Amazing soft smooth hair after use
Utrue 2PCS Rhinestone Headbands（random color）
Utrue
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'plastic', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Brand': 'Utrue', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 8.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '787365720155'}
I have to say these are really nice headbands and very well made. The stones sparkle. Now this could just be preference, I don't like how bulky they are and how much they pop up on my head. Thats why I gave them 4 stars. They are comfortable and you can wear all day without getting a headache!
Really well made.. buttt
Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
RATED GREEN
{'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Used this for a few treatments, what I notice, my scalp is softer and  my hair has some more moisture and a little more volume and looks healthier, Didn't notice a difference with flakes or dandruff( but I really only have issues with this in the colder months) .  I like that its all natural, less chemicals the better for my hair.
does moisturize

These are great! Very detailed, nice color and a huge variety. Very easy to apply on and they do last a while. If you are submerging them in water they will fade and peel more quickly. Great as rewards and great value for the quantity you get.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor hair care products, particularly moisturizing treatments, while showing an increasing interest in unique and thoughtful gifts, especially inspirational items and playful accessories. Their recent purchase of temporary tattoos highlights a continued enthusiasm for creative accessories.

- **Ingredients:** The user maintains a strong preference for organic and natural formulations in hair care, aligning with a health-conscious lifestyle and a commitment to minimal chemical exposure.

- **Perfume Sensitivity:** Enjoys pleasant, fruity scents, and values aesthetically appealing elements such as sparkle and thoughtful design in both hair care and accessories.

- **Hair Type Focus:** Seeks products suitable for fine hair to enhance softness and overall health, emphasizing comfort in accessories.

- **Usage Pattern:** Maintains a consistent hair care routine, integrating new items as supplements, and appreciates multi-functional products.

- **Application Method:** Prefers simple and effective application processes for hair care while valuing comfort in all-day wear for accessories.

- **Value for Money:** Emphasizes cost-effectiveness and product longevity, prioritizing high-quality solutions in both hair care and gifts.

- **Feedback Behavior:** Shares satisfaction through high ratings and detailed observations, particularly regarding product performance and value. Recent feedback highlights the effectiveness and enjoyment of fun and engaging accessories.

The user exhibits a clear trend toward high-quality hair care solutions and meaningful, playful accessories that prioritize natural ingredients, comfort, and practicality.
